fields.name: Ability:
fields.value: Control two players into each other at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
Whenever two players target each other during the night, you will deal an Astral Powerful attack to both of them.
If you control someone who does not have a visiting ability, you will make them visit your other target anyway.
Players do not have to be controlled by you in order for you to attack them.
